statements: SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption
SELECT appliance_name, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE appliance_id = 1
SELECT appliance_id, appliance_name, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT AVG(energy_consumed) AS avg_consumption FROM EnergyConsumption
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT appliance_name, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_consumed > 100 ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT appliance_name, energy_consumed, timestamp FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT AVG(energy_consumed) AS avg_energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT appliance_name, COUNT(appliance_id) AS usage_count FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY appliance_name HAVING usage_count > 3 ORDER BY usage_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_appliances;
SELECT appliance_name, energy_consumption FROM smart_home_appliances;
SELECT log_id, log_date, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_logs;
SELECT appliance_name, manufacturer FROM smart_home_appliances WHERE energy_consumption > 50;
SELECT appliance_name, manufacturer, energy_consumption, log_date FROM smart_home_appliances JOIN energy_consumption_logs ON smart_home_appliances.appliance_id = energy_consumption_logs.appliance_id;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_appliances WHERE manufacturer = 'Samsung' ORDER BY energy_consumption DESC;
SELECT appliance_id, appliance_name FROM smart_home_appliances WHERE energy_consumption > 100 ORDER BY appliance_name;
SELECT appliance_name, energy_consumption FROM smart_home_appliances WHERE energy_consumption BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY appliance_name DESC;

SELECT appliance_name, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM smart_home_appliances JOIN energy_consumption_logs ON smart_home_appliances.appliance_id = energy_consumption_logs.appliance_id GROUP BY appliance_name ORDER BY total_energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT appliance_name, manufacturer FROM smart_home_appliances WHERE appliance_id IN (SELECT appliance_id FROM energy_consumption_logs WHERE energy_consumed > 50) ORDER BY appliance_name;
SELECT * FROM SmartHomeAppliances;
SELECT appliance_name, power_consumption FROM SmartHomeAppliances;
SELECT appliance_name, power_consumption FROM SmartHomeAppliances WHERE power_consumption > 100;
SELECT appliance_id, appliance_name FROM SmartHomeAppliances ORDER BY appliance_id DESC;
SELECT a.appliance_name, b.location FROM SmartHomeAppliances a INNER JOIN ApplianceLocation b ON a.appliance_id = b.appliance_id;
SELECT * FROM SmartHomeAppliances;
SELECT appliance_id, appliance_name FROM SmartHomeAppliances WHERE power_consumption > 1000 ORDER BY appliance_name ASC;

SELECT s.appliance_name, e.consumption_value, e.consumption_date FROM SmartHomeAppliances s JOIN EnergyConsumption e ON s.appliance_id = e.appliance_id WHERE e.consumption_value > 50 ORDER BY e.consumption_date DESC;
SELECT a.appliance_name, l.location FROM ApplianceLocation l JOIN SmartHomeAppliances a ON a.appliance_id = l.appliance_id WHERE l.location = 'Living Room';

SELECT s.appliance_name, SUM(e.consumption_value) AS total_consumption FROM SmartHomeAppliances s JOIN EnergyConsumption e ON s.appliance_id = e.appliance_id GROUP BY s.appliance_name HAVING total_consumption > 5000 ORDER BY total_consumption DESC;
SELECT * FROM appliances;
SELECT appliance_name, power_consumption FROM appliances;
SELECT location_name FROM locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT appliance_name, energy_used FROM appliances JOIN energy_consumption ON appliances.appliance_id = energy_consumption.appliance_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM appliances WHERE power_consumption > 50 ORDER BY appliance_name DESC;
SELECT appliance_name, power_consumption FROM appliances WHERE power_consumption BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT location_name, energy_used FROM locations INNER JOIN energy_consumption ON locations.location_id = energy_consumption.location_id WHERE energy_used > 500;
SELECT u.username, a.appliance_name, ec.energy_used FROM users u JOIN energy_consumption ec ON u.user_id = ec.appliance_id JOIN appliances a ON ec.appliance_id = a.appliance_id;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE DATE_PART('month', consumption_date) = 5 AND energy_used < 1000;
SELECT * FROM SmartHomeAppliances;
SELECT appliance_name, energy_consumption FROM SmartHomeAppliances;
SELECT appliance_name, energy_consumption FROM SmartHomeAppliances WHERE energy_consumption > 50;

SELECT room_name, appliance_name, energy_consumption FROM Rooms JOIN AppliancesInRooms ON Rooms.room_id = AppliancesInRooms.room_id JOIN SmartHomeAppliances ON AppliancesInRooms.appliance_id = SmartHomeAppliances.appliance_id;
SELECT user_name, email, usage_date FROM Users JOIN UserApplianceHistory ON Users.user_id = UserApplianceHistory.user_id WHERE energy_consumed > 100;
SELECT * FROM SmartHomeAppliances

SELECT room_name, appliance_name, energy_consumption FROM Rooms JOIN AppliancesInRooms ON Rooms.room_id = AppliancesInRooms.room_id JOIN SmartHomeAppliances ON AppliancesInRooms.appliance_id = SmartHomeAppliances.appliance_id

SELECT Users.user_name, SmartHomeAppliances.appliance_name, UserApplianceHistory.usage_date FROM Users JOIN UserApplianceHistory ON Users.user_id = UserApplianceHistory.user_id JOIN SmartHomeAppliances ON UserApplianceHistory.appliance_id = SmartHomeAppliances.appliance_id
SELECT energy_consumed, user_name FROM UserApplianceHistory JOIN Users ON UserApplianceHistory.user_id = Users.user_id

SELECT appliance_name, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM SmartHomeAppliances JOIN UserApplianceHistory ON SmartHomeAppliances.appliance_id = UserApplianceHistory.appliance_id GROUP BY appliance_name
